archimate:Principle.name: DP12 - Promote Participation Through Inclusivity
archimate:Principle.documentation:
The design principle of inclusive governance, fairness, and equality is crucial for data space initiatives. It aims to provide comprehensive guidelines and mechanisms to ensure equitable initial conditions and access to data and services based on specific policies, contracts, and consents.
Core concepts: Accessible Participation mechanisms, inclusive governance mechanism, fairness and equality,
